definition: chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)

sentences.english: Constructing service chain is a necessity for the development of the Chinese retailing industry.
sentences.chinese: 构建服务链战略是中国零售业发展的必然选择。

sentences.english: Please keep your dog on a leash.
sentences.chinese: 请把你的狗用狗链拴好。

sentences.english: Lesion of ossicular chain is a common ear disease impairing the sense of hearing.
sentences.chinese: 听骨链病变是导致患者听力水平下降的普遍病症。

sentences.english: It begins from the time the evidence enters the laboratory, which is documented via the chain of custody.
sentences.chinese: 它从证据进入到实验室时就以保管链的形式被记录。

sentences.english: While walking the dog, you were careless and it got loose.
sentences.chinese: 在遛狗的时候，你一粗心松开了手中的狗链。

sentences.english: My watch is automatic,there's no need to wind it.
sentences.chinese: 我的表是自动的，不用上链。

sentences.english: Commodore, he's disabled the rudder chain, sir.
sentences.chinese: 准将，他把舵链松开了，先生。

sentences.english: A city's yearly water consumption is a homogeneous Markov chain.
sentences.chinese: 城市年用水量是一个齐次马尔可夫链。

sentences.english: Together, this creates a structure of chains of governance that goes along with the corporate organisation.
sentences.chinese: 合在一起就创建了符合整合企业组织的治理链的结构。

sentences.english: At high external field, the polyampholyte chain is more extended.
sentences.chinese: 电场强度较高时，两性聚离子链构型更为舒展。

sentences.english: The present paper is to discuss the elasticity of muscle in case of non-Gauss chains.
sentences.chinese: 本文旨在探讨非高斯链情形下肌肉的弹性。

sentences.english: The study of sedimentary cycles at analyzing stratigraphic sequence is important.
sentences.chinese: 本文应用马尔柯夫链进行地层序列分析。

sentences.english: The method of calculating an assembly chain by the relative tolerance zone is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了用协调公差带解装配尺寸链的方法。

sentences.english: The reaction of chain scission is first-order reaction.
sentences.chinese: 白油的断链为一级反应。

sentences.english: Roller chain models are available only in hook suspension.
sentences.chinese: 所有起重链都适用于吊钩和吊耳。

sentences.english: That is the apposition chains on space.
sentences.chinese: 这就是余华小说在空间形式上的并置链。

definition: industry chain (concept proposed by US scholar Michael Porter in 1985)
to drive/to propel/drive (vehicle wheel)/drive mechanism (tape or disk)/device driver (computing software)
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
to come together (to form sth)/to assemble together/(chemistry) to polymerize
to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
